couponsWidget.title: Coupons
couponsWidget.newPromotion: You can add coupons after saving a promotion

labels.is-combine-with-self: Can be redeemed more than once

descr.promotion-name: Give your promotion a unique name that will be displayed in the promotion list
descr.is-active: Use this button to enable or disable your promotion
descr.start-date: If you do not specify a start date, the promotion will become active immediately after you save it
descr.expiration-date: If you do not specify an end date, the promotion will be active until you deactivate it
descr.priority: The promotion with the highest priority is applied first
descr.exclusivity: If you select 'Globally Exclusive', your customers will be unable to apply any other promotions with lower priority to the order
descr.is-combine-with-self: Enable this option if multiple coupons are required to redeem the offer

promotion-detail.cannot-be-saved: You are currently limited to the scope of the stores and the selected promotion is assigned to multiple stores. Editing this promotion is not allowed

labels.code-description: Coupon code may contain only alphanumeric characters
labels.max-uses-number-description: Specify the number of times this coupon may be redeemed. If you do not want to set any limit, put 0
labels.max-uses-per-user-description: Specify the number of times this coupon may be redeemed by a single user. If you do not want to set any limit, put 0
labels.reservation-expiration-date-description: Leave this field blank in case it is the same as the promotion expiration date
labels.upload-description: The CSV file containing coupon data must have the following format: [coupon_code][delimiter][max_use_number][delimiter][member_id] (remove square brackets). If you do not want to set any use number limit, set max_use_number at 0
